Text:
why not get the newer version (1.51)from the original authors website ?
I don't understand why this was posted..

You may have your reasons but it seems like another risky freeware app that could potentialy contain malware..
And why risk it when a free download is available from the coder ?

Par for the course at TPB

Hi xmule. Thanks for your comment, and don't worry there is no malware or any kind of virus. This was just my first upload, sorry wasn't that good, I'll try something better next, but anyway  this one is clean!
